Features.title: Standardise your Data
Features.description: Migrate your older data sources such as feeds, flat files (CSV, MS Excel, MS Access, etc), and more into SQL database(s).

Features.title: Data Management and Visualisation - SaaS
Features.description: Either cloud or On-Premise SaaS to query, maintain, and visualise your data.

Features.title: Data Management and Visualisation - Fully Customised
Features.description: If the SaaS products don't meet your requirements, we build fully customised versions in far less time than competitors (and you keep the code).
